accrueDueTokens(address).details: DBR debt is accrued at a rate of 1 DBR per 1 DOLA of debt per year.

params.user: The address of the user to accrue DBR debt to.

addMarket(address).details: markets can be added but cannot be removed. A removed market would result in unrepayable debt for some users.

params.market_: The address of the new market contract to be added.

params.minter_: The address of the new minter.

params.amount: Amount to be approved to spend
params.spender: Address of the spender to be approved

returns._0: Always returns true, will revert if not successful.

balanceOf(address).details: The balance of a user is calculated as the difference between the user's balance and the user's accrued DBR debt + due DBR debt.

returns._0: uint representing the balance of the user.

deficitOf(address).details: The deficit of a user is calculated as the difference between the user's accrued DBR deb + due DBR debt and their balance.

returns._0: uint representing the deficit of the user.

onBorrow(address,uint256).details: Accrues due tokens on behalf of the user, before increasing their debt.

params.additionalDebt: The additional amount of DOLA the user is borrowing

onForceReplenish(address,address,uint256.details: Accrues due tokens on behalf of the user, before increasing their debt by the replenishment price and minting them new DBR.

params.amount: The amount of DBR the user will be force replenished.
params.user: The user to be force replenished.

onRepay(address,uint256).details: Accrues due tokens on behalf of the user, before reducing their debt.

params.user: The address of the borrower having their debt repaid

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.details: Can be bundled with a transferFrom call, to reduce transaction load on users.

params.deadline: Timestamp after which the signed message is no longer valid.
params.owner: Address of the owner permitting the spending
params.r: The r param of the ECDSA signature
params.s: The s param of the ECDSA signature
params.spender: Address allowed to spend on behalf of owner.
params.v: The v param of the ECDSA signature
params.value: Amount to be allowed to spend.

params.minter_: The address to be removed from the minter set.

signedBalanceOf(address).details: This function will revert if a user has a balance of more than 2^255-1 DBR

returns._0: Returns a signed int of the user's balance

totalSupply().details: The total supply is calculated as the difference between total DBR minted and total DBR accrued.

returns._0: uint representing the total supply of DBR.

params.amount: The amount of DBR to transfer

returns._0: Always returns true, will revert if not successful.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).details: Allowance is reduced by the amount transferred.

returns._0: Always returns true, will revert if not successful.

accrueDueTokens(address).notice: Accrue due DBR debt of user

addMarket(address).notice: Adds a market to the set of active markets. Only callable by Operator.

addMinter(address).notice: Add a minter to the set of addresses allowed to mint DBR tokens. Only callable by Operator.

approve(address,uint256).notice: Approves spender to spend amount of DBR on behalf of the message sender.

balanceOf(address).notice: Get the DBR balance of an address. Will return 0 if the user has zero DBR or a deficit.

burn(uint256).notice: Function for burning DBR from message sender, reducing supply.

claimOperator().notice: claims the Operator role if set as pending operator.

deficitOf(address).notice: Get the DBR deficit of an address. Will return 0 if th user has zero DBR or more.

invalidateNonce().notice: Function for invalidating the nonce of a signed message.

mint(address,uint256).notice: Function for minting new DBR, increasing supply. Only callable by minters and the operator.

onBorrow(address,uint256).notice: Function to be called by markets when a borrow occurs.

onForceReplenish(address,address,uint256.notice: Function to be called by markets when a force replenish occurs. This function can only be called if the user has a DBR deficit.

onRepay(address,uint256).notice: Function to be called by markets when a repayment occurs.

permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Permits an address to spend on behalf of another address via a signed message.

removeMinter(address).notice: Removes a minter from the set of addresses allowe to mint DBR tokens. Only callable by Operator.

setPendingOperator(address).notice: Sets pending operator of the contract. Operator role must be claimed by the new oprator. Only callable by Operator.

setReplenishmentPriceBps(uint256).notice: Sets the replenishment price in basis points. Replenishment price denotes the increase in DOLA debt upon forced replenishments. At 10000, the cost of replenishing 1 DBR is 1 DOLA in debt. Only callable by Operator.

signedBalanceOf(address).notice: Get the signed DBR balance of an address.

totalSupply().notice: Get the total supply of DBR tokens.

transfer(address,uint256).notice: Transfers amount to address to from message sender.

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: Transfer amount of DBR  on behalf of address from to address to. Message sender must have a sufficient allowance from the from address.

@notice Sets pending operator of the contract. Operator role must be claimed by the new oprator. Only callable by Operator.
@param newOperator_ The address of the newOperator

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Replenishment price cannot exceed 100 DOLA per DBR"

arguments.value: Replenishment price cannot exceed 100 DOLA per DBR

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Replenishment price cannot exceed 100 DOLA per DBR"

documentation.text: @notice claims the Operator role if set as pending operator.

@notice Add a minter to the set of addresses allowed to mint DBR tokens. Only callable by Operator.
@param minter_ The address of the new minter.

@notice Removes a minter from the set of addresses allowe to mint DBR tokens. Only callable by Operator.
@param minter_ The address to be removed from the minter set.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

arguments.value: Permit(address owner,address spender,uint256 value,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)
